articles.author: Kaan Serin
articles.title: Helldivers 2 has been pulled from Steam in 170 countries without PSN access, while Valve ignores its own policy to issue refunds for players with over 100 hours - Gamesradar
articles.description: Steam only issues refunds for players with less than 2 hours of playtime in-game, normally
articles.content:
The Helldivers 2 debacle has reached new hellish lows as the year's best-selling game is now unavailable on Steam in over 170 countries. 
Earlier this week, publisher Sony announced that all Helldiv… [+2391 chars]

articles.title: Scientists made chilling discovery after finally reaching the bottom of the Red Sea - LADbible
articles.description: It was a chilling discovery made by the scientists who reached the bottom of the Red Sea, and do you really want to know what they found?
articles.content:
Scientists studying the the Red Sea made a chilling discovery when they finally reached the bottom.
Located between Africa and the Arabian Peninsula, because why else would Moses need to cross it to… [+2659 chars]

articles.author: Alex Kalinauckas
articles.title: F1 Miami GP: Verstappen fends off Leclerc for pole again - Autosport
articles.description: Max Verstappen beat Charles Leclerc to take pole position for Formula 1’s 2024 Miami Grand Prix, with both drivers failing to set their best times on their final qualifying laps.
articles.content:
Verstappen posted a 1m27.241s to lead Leclerc by 0.141-seconds on the first runs in Q3, where they were trailed by Carlos Sainz in the other Ferrari.
On the final runs, although Verstappen set the s… [+2052 chars]

articles.description: It's May 4, Star Wars Jedi: Survivor is available with Xbox Game Pass Ultimate via EA Play and with Free Play days — here's more reasons why you should play!
